Plot: A band director recruits a Harlem street drummer to play at a Southern university.
Title: Drumline
Writer: Shawn Schepps (story), Tina Gordon Chism (screenplay), Shawn Schepps (screenplay)
Actors: Nick Cannon, Zoe Saldana, Orlando Jones, Leonard Roberts
tomatoConsensus: Essentially a sports movie with drums, the energetic Drumline somehow manages to make the familiar seem fresh.
